title: Interpreting a signaling pathway Set member 5

content.question: A researcher observes that mice from the mutant strain experience low blood sugar. Which of the following best describes the feedback mechanism in the pathway (Figure 1) causing the low blood sugar in the mutant strain?

choices.label: The positive feedback of insulin production
The negative feedback of inactive osteocalcin production
The positive feedback of the <math alttext="E s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Esp</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> protein
The negative feedback of insulin-secreting pancreatic cell proliferation

content.answer: The positive feedback of insulin production

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
